Feel the energy of Brazilian Soccer at its best

Join the Futsal 101 conference as a competitor, team, sporting official or Fan!

Get Started Learn More

Find your future, find your fun.

Competitor

Any and ever player is welcome to Futsal 101 start and sign up for a team registration to be placed and united with your 5-man/woman sqaud early registration ensures a placement in a choice bracket.

Teams

Coaches and captains, enroll your squad in the biggest indoor soccer match to date . Match against squads in your age brackets and find your teams rythm to enjoy 1st prize.

Sporting Officials

Futsal 101 won't be limited to players and their complimentaries, we need you too. Have extensive knowledge in the game, enroll, complete the 2-class course and become an official arbiter. Scouts will have access to rosters and information when you decide to enroll

Attention Fans

Major fan of Futsal 101? Just getting into the sport? Congrats you've found your way to the conference here!

"I play soccer - But Futsal will always be what I enjoy most"
Cristiano Ronaldo / Real Madrid
